Question
========
  
What score $X$ corresponds to the 25th percentile? 

![](uu-percentile-800-nl-tabel.jpg)
  
Answerlist
----------
* $X = 0.5$
* $X = 1.0$	
* $X = 1.5$
* $X = 2$


Solution
========
  
For the 25th percentile at 12 observations, we look for the value in between the third and fourth values. In this case, those are 1 and 2.
